languages.text: В нарушение ритуала эксплуатации прометиевые баки шаттла брошены открытыми — кто-то прервал таинство топливной заправки.
In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.
languages.original_text: В нарушение ритуала эксплуатации прометиевые баки шаттла брошены открытыми — кто-то прервал таинство топливной заправки.

traits.locale_text: In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.
In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.
In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone had interrupted the fuelling sacrament.
In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone had interrupted the fuelling sacrament.
In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.
In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.

languages.text: Die Promethium-Tanks wurden offen zurückgelassen, ein Verstoß gegen das Betriebsritual. Jemand hat das Sakrament des Betankens unterbrochen.
languages.original_text: In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.

traits.locale_text: Die Promethium-Tanks wurden offen zurückgelassen, ein Verstoß gegen das Betriebsritual. Jemand hat das Sakrament des Betankens unterbrochen.

languages.text: Contrairement à toutes les règles du Rite d'Opération, les réservoirs de prométhium de cette navette ont été abandonnés et laissés ouverts. Quelqu'un a clairement interrompu le sacrement de ravitaillement.
languages.original_text: In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.

traits.locale_text: Contrairement à toutes les règles du Rite d'Opération, les réservoirs de prométhium de cette navette ont été abandonnés et laissés ouverts. Quelqu'un a clairement interrompu le sacrement de ravitaillement.

languages.text: 穿梭机的钷素罐被弃置一旁，而且罐口大开，严重违反了操作仪典。看起来像有什么人打断了加油仪式。
languages.original_text: In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.

traits.locale_text: 穿梭机的钷素罐被弃置一旁，而且罐口大开，严重违反了操作仪典。看起来像有什么人打断了加油仪式。

languages.text: 稼働の儀式に違反して、シャトルのプロメチウムタンクは放置されて開け放たれている。何者かが燃料補給の聖餐を中断したようだ。
languages.original_text: In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.

traits.locale_text: 稼働の儀式に違反して、シャトルのプロメチウムタンクは放置されて開け放たれている。何者かが燃料補給の聖餐を中断したようだ。

languages.text: En violación del Rito de Operación, los tanques de prometio de la lanzadera han sido abandonados y se han dejado abiertos. Alguien había interrumpido el sacramento del repostaje.
languages.original_text: In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.

traits.locale_text: En violación del Rito de Operación, los tanques de prometio de la lanzadera han sido abandonados y se han dejado abiertos. Alguien había interrumpido el sacramento del repostaje.

languages.text: Faaliyet Ayini ihlal edilerek mekiğin prometyum tankları terk edilmiş ve öylece açıkta bırakılmış. Birileri kutsal yakıt törenine mâni olmuş.
languages.original_text: In violation of the Rite of Operation, the shuttle's promethium tanks have been abandoned and left open: someone interrupted the fuelling sacrament.

traits.locale_text: Faaliyet Ayini ihlal edilerek mekiğin prometyum tankları terk edilmiş ve öylece açıkta bırakılmış. Birileri kutsal yakıt törenine mâni olmuş.
